data.text: @Melendrez_sja @KimKardashian Samantha, go back and read your own tweets. You were making excuses.
@KelleyB101 @KimKardashian You’re reading to much into a tweet LOL and no one is making excuses for bullying.

@Melendrez_sja @KimKardashian 2 paragraphs? LOL 

But seriously, bullying is not something anyone should make excuses for.
@KelleyB101 @KimKardashian It’s not that serious lmao you don’t have to write two paragraphs about it lol 😂 this topic hasn’t come up since my tweet so you can just leave it like that lol

@Melendrez_sja @KimKardashian Just in case you forgot, people in the limelight Are real people... not fictional characters.  They have real feelings. 
And there are a lot of impressiionable people who admire Kim, and assume her behavior is ok.   And that makes her bullying twice as disturbing.

@Melendrez_sja @KimKardashian The tweet popped up on my feed yesterday... and my point is still valid. 
Kim IS a bully.  Has been for a long time. That she bullies people in the limelight as well as others don't excuse her overall behavior.  It's the behavior that is wrong regardless of who it's directed at.

@KelleyB101 @KimKardashian This tweet is from May lol. I don’t even think she’s bullying her to extent to call it bullying. It’s a feud between two celebrities that card can’t be played when your in the limelight ! @KimKardashian
@Melendrez_sja @KimKardashian Kim actually is a bully.  Her own sisters have said so on their show.
